daf6f4c4-5402-4fa3-93f4-3180243c8a3c.description:

efc1f452-8431-44c5-8c21-a06d53aed16c.description:

91037f2c-5230-464b-8873-ad13355539af.description:

fd936bf7-33fa-4d47-88de-e7f7ba03861b.title: Drop Container
fd936bf7-33fa-4d47-88de-e7f7ba03861b.description: This container can store any drop! Interact with it or power it with logic to release drops. Outputs a logic signal when not empty.

a9ad3ebe-9c19-49fc-855c-5061ce157e4e.title: Photo Sensor
a9ad3ebe-9c19-49fc-855c-5061ce157e4e.description: This sensor can detect sunlight. Yeah, that's it.

4d14e5c2-9f59-4a14-9d47-2a4a1cc0c9fe.description: A chest to store extra items. When your inventory gets too full. Don't worry, everything inside the chest won't get lost. And if it does, it's definitely not my fault...

3da3d636-d263-4443-bdc5-37a8facd73c5.description:

8f190ce2-3a59-423e-8483-a7aa67bd5bc0.description: Use this tool to sell items. You can change the maximum sell amount to sell extra items from your inventory.
